item.description:
"Real Deal 101"

Tons of Information for Wholesalers and Rehabbers!



NHREIA Board Members, Bert Cox and Kevin Lacasse will share their real estate investing secrets.

You'll learn:

Exit strategies
Estimating rehab costs
Managing contractors
How to make the numbers work
Making a great wholesale deal
Biggest pitfalls for wholesalers and rehabbers


NHREIA December Monthly Meeting
When: 6:30 pm, Wednesday December 10, 2009

Where: Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Cost: Free for NHREIA members; only $20 for visitors and meetup members
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association December Meetup
